dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: What? No, seriously! Did you even read this thing about the dump trucks?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What? No, seriously! Did you even read this thing about the dump trucks?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, yeah. More, like, regulations. Yawn. Who actually cares?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, yeah. More, like, regulations. Yawn. Who actually cares?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: No, but this is, like, a big deal for our roads, for the whole infrastructure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but this is, like, a big deal for our roads, for the whole infrastructure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Roads are always bad. What's one more rule gonna do, suddenly make them perfect?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Roads are always bad. What's one more rule gonna do, suddenly make them perfect?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: They're literally letting these guys double the weight limit. Like, 25 tons is okay, but they're doing 40!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're literally letting these guys double the weight limit. Like, twenty five tons is okay, but they're doing forty!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Many of them transport inert cargo with a double excess of the permissible load. With a permissible load of 25 tons, drivers transport 35-40 tons.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: So? Big trucks, big loads. That's, um, kinda their job, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So? Big trucks, big loads. That's, um, kinda their job, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: No! It absolutely destroys the asphalt. Prematurely! Think of all the potholes, dude, everywhere.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No! It absolutely destroys the asphalt. Prematurely! Think of all the potholes, dude, everywhere.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Excess weight leads to premature destruction of the road surface.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Potholes are just a fact of life, B. This is just gonna be more fines for everyone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Potholes are just a fact of life, B. This is just gonna be more fines for everyone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, the fines are gonna be massive. We're talking like, up to 3.7 million tenge!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, the fines are gonna be massive. We're talking like, up to three point seven million tenge!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The amounts vary from 40 to 1000 MCI (147 thousand - 3.7 million tenge).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: And they're putting in these new automated stations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're putting in these new automated stations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To strengthen control, 6 new automated stations have already been installed at the entrance to the capital.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Automated? Please. Everyone'll just find a way around them, like they always do.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Automated? Please. Everyone'll just find a way around them, like they always do.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: That's the whole point, though! To minimize, uh, corruption risks, you know? It's supposed to be harder to just pay someone off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the whole point, though! To minimize, uh, corruption risks, you know? It's supposed to be harder to just pay someone off.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the transport department, these measures will help reduce road congestion and minimize corruption risks in the field of transport control.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Right. Corruption. Good luck with that. They're only in test mode anyway, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. Corruption. Good luck with that. They're only in test mode anyway, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They are currently operating in test mode, but their number will be increased in the future.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but they're adding more. And this impacts everything. Like, if the roads get worse, then traffic gets worse. They're saying Astana and Almaty could get paralyzed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but they're adding more. And this impacts everything. Like, if the roads get worse, then traffic gets worse. They're saying Astana and Almaty could get paralyzed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Read also: Astana and Almaty to be paralyzed by traffic jams - analysts

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Paralyzed by, um, overweight Chinese dump trucks. Sounds like some kind of weird sci-fi disaster movie.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Paralyzed by, um, overweight Chinese dump trucks. Sounds like some kind of weird sci-fi disaster movie.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Ministry of Transport, about 60 thousand dump trucks are registered in Kazakhstan, of which 40 thousand are made in China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: It's not funny! It's our roads, our money that pays for this, dude. When they break, we pay.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not funny! It's our roads, our money that pays for this, dude. When they break, we pay.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, yeah, I get it. Roads bad, fines big. Wake me up when they actually, like, fix something.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, yeah, I get it. Roads bad, fines big. Wake me up when they actually, like, fix something.
